title: Drupal security advisory (AV25-828)
description: On December 10, 2025, Drupal published security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following product:
products: Acquia Content Hub   versions 3.6.x prior to 3.6.4
Acquia Content Hub   versions 3.7.x prior to 3.7.3
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
